result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Heidi M Rose

records.addlTxt: JSS Social Worker re: update on def

State by Ruud /  Def in custody of LCJ by video
State:  Def has new case (22CM800) for retail theft & BJ which allegedly occurred on Thurs.
CRT:  I did a 48-hr review
State:  I rec'd Notice from Atty Rhodes that he had another appt., but thought he would be able to log in by zoom
CRT:  release plan filed on 10-28-2022
State:  it was sent to both myself & Atty Rhodes
CRT:  I set bond for cash in amount of $2500 for new arrest (22CM800)
State;  no issue w/ Ms Rose being released if she goes directly to LE Phellips.  She does have a ed at a treatment facility once she is done @ LE Phillips.  There is concern, she needs a treatment plan when she is back out in community
CRT:  it is my understanding that she does not want to avail herself of treatment
Def:  I told JSS I would comply w/ plan.  I was supposed to go to LE Phellips on Thurs night but I was arrested in the afternoon.  Rob will take me
CRT:  ONCE A BED IS AVAILABLE I WILL CONVERT THE CASH BOND IN 22CM800 TO A $2500 SIGNATURE BOND - Conditions:  Remain @ LE Phillips until properly discharged.  Complete treatment @ Arbor House or similar facility.  Do follow-up trmt w/ a treatment plan.  If def leaves before successfully completing treatment programs, bond will be converted back to $2500 cash bond
Def comments on IOP
CRT comments that a release plan from Arbor Place should be prepared & followed
CRT:  INITIAL APP SET FOR 11-17-2022 @ 2 pm (22CM800)
CRT:  work w/ JSS to contact placement facilities
CRT:  once a bed is verified, Rob can come & pick def up

Rhodes - requests sig bond 
CRT:  $5000 sig bond to cover all the files with conditions: all prior conditions of bond to remain and ADD:  Sign releases; take medications as prescribed and work on well being.  GPS can be removed from the bond.

State by Donskey by video /  Def in custody LCJ w/ Atty Rhodes - both by video
Rhodes:  I have update for CRT & State - Motion was filed in 22CM667
State:  I saw the Motion
Rhodes addresses struggles/issues def is having re: treatment
CRT comments on monitored antabuse
Rhodes:  have not discussed w/ JSS
State:  we are hoping to find option that helps def deal w/ substance abuse issue in community...If IOP is only option, I would request a structured plan & that def not be released prematurely to avoid setting up for failure.  I would like a more detailed structured [plan] to prevent what has happened in past
CRT:  failure may be def's demise.  I could do a brief release for her to set appointments.  I would like antabuse to be option.  If def needs to make an appt w/ a dr., I would release her to attend that meeting.  I will work w/ you to meed def's needs in assisting her w/ being bond compliant & being successful in community.  We do not need a Hrg, if I know in advance I can have def released.  If IOP is available, let me know.  It does not seem that State is objecting to her staying w/ Mr H.
CRT addresses Ms. Rose

Def in custody w/Atty Springer for Rhodes
STC: 11/3 @ 8:30 (TWB) all files

State b yNelson /  Def NA  /  atty Rhodes
Warrant remains

from Kaylene J, JSS   re: change of placement - plan is to admit def to Ophelia House & def will apply for Unity House knowing there is 4-6 week waiting period
Per TWB:  I will approve the change of residence.  Set a Review Hrg  for 9-7-2022 @ 2 pm.  Ms Rose will be expected to appear in person unless JSS advises programming will be affected

State by Donskey by video /  Def w/ Atty Rhodes in person
CRT:  Review Hrg
Rhodes:  plan is to enroll def in IOP Program @ Gundersen.  She can walk there to attend programming.  I have not gotten update from JSS after she'd been released.  Ms Rose is going to JSS, she has sponsor & support network
CRT asks about bond restrictions
Rhodes:  bond restrictions are OK at this time.  Def may want to address GPS restriction at some point
CRT:  you can get on my Intake calendar @ 2 pm if you want to review that.  Next CRT is 11-3-2022
CRT advises def to work w/ JSS
Hailey J from JSS asks about positive tests
CRT:  address it right away & warrant may be issued.  Notify Atty Rhodes.  Atty Rhodes can reschedule the 11-3-2022 if needed

ADDRESS INFO for State of Wisconsin
Current: 1519 9th St S, La Crosse, WI 54601 United States  (Effective: 08-22-2022)
Prior: 333 Vine Street, La Crosse, WI 54601-3200
$5000 Sig bond signed by def

Def in custody w/Atty Rhodes
Def to talk to PD office & reapply
$5000 sig bond to cover all files- 2 PBT's a day, no alcohol, bars or taverns or liqour stores,  GPS house arrest- can be out for appointments & positive meetings only, - remove no contact w/RH & residence
Directing Law Enforcement Assistance

State by ? /   Def in custody
Pre-trial Report filed
Probable Cause Stmt & Judicial Determination filed
To be addressed w/ TWB
Initial App:  8-22-2022 @ 11:30 w/ other cases

State by Ruud by video /  Def in custody LCJ by video w/ Atty Rhodes in person /  KJ, JSS by video
CRT:  Release plan was filed by JSS
State:  no objection
Rhodes:  I went over this w/ def
Def:  I can be admitted to Oshkosh tomorrow
KJ:  Transportation is set up, they will be here @ 9:45 am to pick def up
CRT addresses def about being in compliance, prior to completing services your atty can request a bond hrg
KJ:  program is 28 days
CRT:  Bail/Bond Hrg set for 8-30-2022 @ 8:30 am by zoom - All cases will be called
State:  no objection to modifying bond as discussed
CRT:  BOND MODIFIED TO $1500 SIGNATURE BOND TO COVER ALL CASES (21CM782, 21CM932, 21CM1012, 22CM46, 22CM387, 22CM408 & 22CM494) w/ conditions:  do not consume any alcohol;  No bars or taverns;  No Contact w/ address on file;  Remain @ Nova in Oshkosh until properly discharged.  If def leaves early, a warrant can be issued
CRT:  Jail is not to release def until KJ notifies that transportation is available
Bail/bond hearing on August 30, 2022 at 08:30 am.
from Kaylene, JSS    re: Treatment plan
Def's Motion for bond modification
